name: Woocommerce Pesapal Standard Payment Gateway
author: Jonathan Kosgei

sections.description: Extends woocommerce payment gateway’s to enable usage of pesapal to purchase goods. Payment can then be made via mobile money, visa/mastercard , bank transfer or from one’s pesapal e-wallet.
sections.installation:
1. Upload woocommerce-pesapal-standard.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Navigate to the Pesapal settings page under Woocommerce/Settings/Checkout/Pesapal
    4.Copy and Paste your consumer secret and your api key from pesapal.com.
    5.Copy and paste your demo consumer secret and your api key from demo.pesapal.com.
sections.faq:
How to enable Instant Payment Notifications

Add the following url to as your IPN notification url in your pesapal merchant dashboard :
http://www.your-site.com/?wc-api=WC_Pesapal_Standard_Gateway

short_description: Extends Woocommerce with a Pesapal payment gateawy.
description: Extends woocommerce payment gateway’s to enable usage of pesapal to purchase goods. Payment can then be made via mobile money, visa/mastercard , bank transfer or from one’s pesapal e-wallet.

upgrade_notice.1.0: Version 1.0 integrates with Instant Payment Notifications from the Payment Gateway.

screenshots.caption: The various payment options offered by Pesapal are displayed on the order-pay page on checkout. These include m-pesa, airtel money, yu cash, equity % co-operative banks and the pesapal e-wallet.
